name: Pop!
description: Scrawl art designed by the Ventkids to customize your K-Drive.

languages.description: Gekritzel wurde von den Schachtkindern entworfen, um dein K-Drive anzupassen.

languages.description: Décalque artistique conçu par les Orphelins des Conduits afin de personnaliser votre K-Drive.

languages.description: 벤트키드들이 디자인 한 K-드라이브를 꾸밀 수 있는 낙서입니다.

languages.description: Grafiti diseñado por los Ventkids para personalizar tu K-Drive.

languages.description: Artystyczna bazgranina Nawiewniaków do spersonalizowania Twojego K-Drive.
languages.name: POP!

languages.name: POP!

languages.description: 由通風小子設計的塗鴉藝術，可以用於自訂你的 K 式懸浮板。

languages.description: ศิลปะภาพวาดลายเส้นที่ออกแบบโดย Ventkids เพื่อปรับแต่ง K-Drive ของคุณ
languages.name: POP!

languages.description: K-Drive'ınızı özelleştirmek için Ventkids tarafından dizayn edilen Scrawl sanatı.
